des: "An awesome change from cheesy fondue sauces! This pizza fondue is great for both kids and adults."
ins: Stir spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, Parmesan cheese, oregano, dried onion, and garlic salt together in a fondue pot or heavy pan. Light the fondue pot or place over medium heat, stirring sauce to melt cheeses. Serve with cubes of French bread for dipping.
